title: when I click the exceptions for my do not disturb settings the entire Android settings app crashes
content: This has been happening for a couple of months now. I haven't been able to resolve it. When I click the exceptions in my do not disturb settings the entire settings app crashes. It happens every time. I haven't been able to change my setting since it began. I have tried clearing the cache and the data for the settings app. That did not resolve it.
